attributes.action: accept that the only way to permanently reduce the demand for energy and, therefore lower greenhouse gases,  is to have a smaller world population
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Humans are the largest users of the worlds energy, so it follows that the greater the number of humans the greater the demand for energy.  Therefore the government should aim to reduce the population by encouraging all families to have fewer children and encourage religious bodies to promote the use of contaception.
